price: Bana hepiniz toptan tuzağınızı kurun. Sonra da bana mühlet vermeyin, dedi.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
